alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Indian River; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:35PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Orange, Seminole, Osceola, Okeechobee, Coastal Volusia, Southern Lake, Inland Northern Brevard, Mainland Northern Brevard, Inland Southern Brevard and Mainland Southern Brevard Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
